import React from "react"; import "./About.css"; export default function Education() { return (

Education

I studied at N 6 secondary school in Ejmiatsin and graduated with red cerificate. Since 2016 I'm attending TUMO Center For Creative Technologies and very soon I will graduate also TUMO. In TUMO I have learnt programming, web design, game development, graphic design and robotx. Now I'm studying at N 5 high school in Echmiatsin. I have improved my skills in web development in Global IT educational center. Now I'm learning Algorithms and Data Structures in Tech42 IT Center.

Live as if you will die tomorrow, learn as if you'll live forever. {" "} Mahatma Gandhi

); }
